title: Bug 49536: No content returned for URL when no webapps are deployed
description: Accessing a URL when no webapps are deployed in Tomcat 7 instance returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 with no content.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7.0.0beta zip file from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server
